context.name: Derya Lion Practical (LP Series) Semi-Auto Shotgun
context.excerpt: The Derya Lion Practical (LP Series) is a 24″ Semi-Auto Sporting Shotgun with 9+1 shot capacity.
context.content: The Derya Lion Practical (LP Series) is a 24" Semi-Auto Sporting Shotgun with 9+1 shot capacity. The Lion Practical features ventilated mounting rails, an oversized charging handle & an extra bullet carrier/match saver.
